title: Chlorophyte Claymore
summaries: The Chlorophyte Claymore is a Hardmode sword which occasionally fires a Chlorophyte Orb projectile when swung. It costs no ammunition or mana, deals the same damage as the sword, can pierce an infinite number of enemies, and dissipates upon hitting a solid block. The Chlorophyte Claymore is the slower but more powerful sword of the two that can be crafted from Chlorophyte Bars, with the other being the Chlorophyte Saber.

The Chlorophyte Orb behaves the same way as the <linked>Magic Dagger</linked>, but has a larger hitbox. Like the Magic Dagger, the orb travels in a straight line at a constant speed for a short distance before dropping steeply and falling faster. Upon impact, the orb implodes and emits a light, sparkly-green particle effect.
